mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ANIME (TITLE, THUMNAIL_GARO_URL, THUMNAIL_SERO_URL, WEEKDAY, SCORE, TAGS) VALUES (#{TITLE}, #{THUMNAIL_GARO_URL}, #{THUMNAIL_SERO_URL}, #{WEEKDAY}, #{SCORE}, #{TAGS})
mapper.select: SELECT ANIME_ID, TITLE, THUMNAIL_GARO_URL, THUMNAIL_SERO_URL, WEEKDAY, SCORE, TAGS FROM TBL_ANIME ORDER BY ANIME_ID
